rules_text:
Trample
[i]Goddess of the West[/i] – Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, support 2. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)[/i]
[i]Resistance Axe[/i] – Whenever a modified creature you control attacks, double target creature's power until end of turn. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
